response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its worth to us, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity tailored for you, considering the immense value this product holds for you. Let's discuss how we can make this deal happen.", "product_price": 950000}
